Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents an educational course offered by Spruce Life Skills.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Course entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the course content and objectives.

category.description: The category or subject area the course belongs to (e.g., 'Leadership', 'Communication').

duration.description: The duration of the course (e.g., '4 weeks', 'Self-paced').

imageUrl.description: URL to the image representing the course.

Inquiry.title: Inquiry
Inquiry.description: Represents an inquiry submitted by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Inquiry entity.

name.description: The name of the person submitting the inquiry.

email.description: The email address of the person submitting the inquiry.

message.description: The message or question submitted by the person.

courseId.description: Reference to Course. (Relationship: Course 1:N Inquiry). The course the inquiry is regarding, if applicable.

submissionDate.description: The date and time when the inquiry was submitted.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was created.

definition.description: Stores course details, including title, description, category, duration, and image URL.
Stores user inquiries related to courses or general questions.
